company.title: Company profile
paragraphs: Wenzhou Yuyi Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010, focusing on R&D, manufacturing and sales of electrical connection products.
We focus on UK series universal terminal blocks, widely used in power, automation, rail transit and new energy industries.
Adhering to ‚Äúquality first, customer first, continuous innovation‚Äù to create sustained value for customers.
